author: dezcom

comments.content:
Currently I’m spending at least several hours a day working on an ad campaign set in Univers. I’m so damned happy to have Univers around and not be stuck with Helvetica.

And Frutiger, well, I just look for excuses to use that one. It’s soooo great.

He da man.

Well, for sans :)

LOL——I’m grading my second year typography tests and one student, she wrote, after the question on the [project](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905134943/http:/homes.ieu.edu.tr/~asegalini/0607/t2-project4.jpg)——_“Adrian Frutiger is a sans-serif typefacer.”_
Typefacer is SOOO a cooler word than type designer. I propose that we immediatly change.

Congratulations, Adrian!  
And thanks for helping us remind it, Dezcom!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905134943im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/rocky_adrian_5380.jpg)

Happy Birthday. May you have many, many more!
Further cause for celebration is Frutiger’s [latest sans design Nami.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905134943/http:/www.linotype.com/3289/nami.html)
